Posts.Content: Apr 25, 2018 04:32AM 10402 wrote: I made sure I wore plenty of the cream they gave me to use and wore a plain soft cotton t-shirt UNDER my bra. It cut down on the soreness. After my radiation treatment was over, I slathered on Aquafor 24/7 for the next couple of weeks until the redness was gone. It worked great.
Posts.Title: Post radiation. Hormone replacement Nyr4evr Nyr4evr
